greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A005887(n) / 2.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: Expansion of q^(-1) * (phi^3(q) - phi^3(-q)) / 4 in powers of q^2 where phi() is a Ramanujan theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 12 2011
mathematica: A005887[n_]:= SeriesCoefficient[(EllipticTheta[3,0,q]^3 - EllipticTheta[3,0,-q]^3)/(2 q), {q, 0, n}];  Table[A005887[n]/2, {n,0, 50}][[1;; ;; 2]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 09 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, n = 2*n + 1; polcoeff( sum( k=1, sqrtint(n), 2 * x^k^2, 1 + x*O(x^n))^3 / 2, n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 12 2011 */
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
